name: Sourdough Croutons

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.details: Organic malted white flour, salt, and young sourdough starter

attributes.title: Allergy Info
attributes.details: This product contains wheat and gluten and may also contain traces of nuts.

attributes.title: Shelf-life and Storage
attributes.details: Enjoy cold or toasted | Keep at room temperature for up to 1 week | For long-term storage, place in zip-lock bags and keep in the freezer for up to 3 months | Bread should not be refrigerated | To serve from freezer, allow bread to thaw at room temp. and then refresh in 180c oven, or toast it right away

attributes.title: Delivery
attributes.details: Sourdough bakery delivers Monday through Saturday of each week upon pre-order with ETA of 2 working days.

description: Sourdough croutons are full of flavor, they are made from our daily baked loaves and they are tastier and healthier than store-bought alternatives. Add them to your salads or soups, or serve them as bruschetta for appetizers.
